S.FORM: == satangahan : == abu u zuma a kamu : nu Hulam :灰燼 nu Amilika :ash nu Zipun :灰 u canan ku abu(abu是什麼?)ː sapihica ku abu(abu做什麼?)ː namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan ː == malaalitin tu i hekalay atu zumaay a natinengan ː ==

== satangahan : == abo o zoma a kamo : no Holam :灰燼 no Amilika :ash no Zipon :灰 o canan ko abo(abo是什麼?)ː sapihica ko abo(abo做什麼?)ː namakayniay a nasolitan nasakamoan ato natinengan ː == malaalitin to i hekalay ato zomaay a natinengan ː ==
